steps.prompt:
Create a detailed trailer plan for:

SYNOPSIS:
{{synopsis}}

TRAILER LENGTH: {{trailerLength}}
TRAILER TYPE: {{trailerType}}
MOOD: {{mood}}
TARGET AUDIENCE: {{targetAudience}}

Provide:

## TRAILER STRUCTURE

### OPENING (First 5 seconds)
- Hook shot description
- Opening text card (if any)
- Sound design

### ACT 1 - SETUP (Next 15-20%)
- Shot 1: [Description, duration, dialogue/VO]
- Shot 2: [Description, duration, dialogue/VO]
- Shot 3: [Description, duration, dialogue/VO]
- Music cue

### ACT 2 - RISING ACTION (Next 40%)
- Shot sequence with increasing intensity
- Key dialogue moments
- Music builds

### ACT 3 - CLIMAX (Next 30%)
- Most intense/exciting shots
- Peak music moment
- Key reveal or twist hint

### ENDING (Final 10%)
- Title card
- Release date
- Final hook shot
- Call to action

## SHOT-BY-SHOT BREAKDOWN
For each shot:
- Shot number
- Duration (seconds)
- Visual description
- Dialogue/VO text
- Sound/music note
- Transition type

## MUSIC GUIDE
- Opening music mood
- Build points
- Climax music
- Ending sting

## TEXT CARDS
- All text that appears on screen
- Font style suggestions
- Timing

## VOICEOVER SCRIPT
- Full VO script if applicable
- Delivery notes

## THUMBNAIL SUGGESTION
- Best frame for thumbnail
- Text overlay suggestion
